nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_success: The snapshot will be created shortly.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_fail: An error occurred when updating the snapshot intervals.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_informations: A snapshot is an instantaneous capture of the status of your NAS-HA, at the precise moment that the snapashot is taken.
Snapshots take up space on your partition to work properly.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_fail_snapsho: The snapshot label cannot be longer than {{maxlength}} characters.
